c74object.name: the.mc.jit.sonogram~
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â©2023, www.xenorama.com.
Translate an incoming mono or stereo multichannel-signal into a sonogram as Jitter Matrix. Two channels of audio can be rendered as mixdown, stereo visualization or parallel (2-plane).

objarg.name: fft-framecount
objarg.description: Resolution of the internal FFT. The default is 2048 frames.

objarg.name: scopesize
objarg.description: Resolution of the Scope. Essentially the number of audio captures contained in the resulting jit_matrix, i.e. dim[0]. The default is 512.

attribute.name: active
attribute.description: Operation flag. When set to "0", no jit_matrix is output

attribute.name: amp
attribute.description: Gain of the input signal. The default is 1.

attribute.name: bg
attribute.description: Set the background color. The default is "0. 0. 0." (black)

attribute.name: clip
attribute.description: Clip bin values to 1. When set to "0", bin values higher than 1 will light up the sonogram accordingly and will thus often oerride the user colors

attribute.name: direction
attribute.description: Direction of the running sonogram. The default is 1 (from right to left)

attribute.name: hi
attribute.description: Set the high color. The default is "1. 0.2 0.6" (magenta)

attribute.name: lo
attribute.description: Set the low color. The default is "0.2 1. 0.3" (green)

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description:
Set the visualization mode. Three different modes are available:
0 (mixdown): stereo channels are mixed to single, colors are applied as per lo and hi values
1 (stereo): stereo channels are split and mirrored with regular color application
2 (parallel): stereo channels are rendered to 2 parallel planes in the jit_matrix, ignoring color selection (magenta = left, green = right, white = center)
the default is 1 (stereo).

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.description: Set the sonogram orientation. The default is 0 (horizontal)

attribute.name: out_name
attribute.digest: Name of the resulting Jitter Matrix
attribute.description: Name of the resulting Jitter Matrix

attribute.name: scopesize
attribute.description: Resolution of the scope, determining the perceived speed in an unaltered jit.pwindow. The default is 512.

method.name: bang
method.description: Re-apply the previous command on the previously provided sound file or path.

method.name: multichannelsignal
method.description: Audio signal to analyze. Note, that any incoming multichannel signal will be reduced to stereo.

method.name: signal
method.description: Audio signal to analyze. Note, that any incoming signelchannel signal will be duplicated to stereo.
